sqlmap.select: SELECT A.USER_SEQ, A.NAME, A.EMAIL, A.PASSWORD, A.ROLE_BASE_SEQ, B.ROLE_SEQ, B.ROLE_NAME FROM lo_user_info A, lo_role_info B WHERE A.EMAIL = #email# AND A.ROLE_BASE_SEQ = B.ROLE_SEQ

SELECT A.USER_SEQ, A.NAME
FROM lo_user_info A, lo_role_info B WHERE A.USER_SEQ = #user_seq# AND A.ROLE_BASE_SEQ = B.ROLE_SEQ

SELECT A.USER_SEQ, A.NAME, A.EMAIL, A.PASSWORD, A.ROLE_BASE_SEQ, B.ROLE_SEQ, B.ROLE_NAME FROM lo_user_info A, lo_role_info B WHERE A.EMAIL = #email# AND A.PASSWORD = #password# AND A.ROLE_BASE_SEQ = B.ROLE_SEQ
sqlmap.insert: UPDATE lo_user_info SET NAME = #name#, PASSWORD = #new_password# WHERE EMAIL = #email# AND PASSWORD = #password#
INSERT INTO lo_gis (IP, SESSION, LAT,LNG,INSERT_DATE) VALUES (#ip#, #session#, #lat#, #lng#, #date#)
SELECT LAT, LNG, MAX(INSERT_DATE) INSERT_DATE FROM lo_gis WHERE INSERT_DATE >= #date# GROUP BY SESSION
sqlmap.select: SELECT LOG_SEQ, TYPE, ICON, EXECUTEFNC, PROTOTYPE FROM lo_log_type

SELECT A.USER_SEQ, A.LOG_SEQ, A.LOG_ID, A.TITLE, A.INSERT_DATE, A.OPEN ,A.TYPE, A.EXECUTEFNC, A.PROTOTYPE, IFNULL(MAX(B.LOG_DATE),0) MAX_DATE, IFNULL(MIN(B.LOG_DATE),0) MIN_DATE FROM( SELECT A.USER_SEQ, A.LOG_SEQ, A.LOG_ID, A.TITLE, A.INSERT_DATE ,A.OPEN ,B.TYPE,B.EXECUTEFNC, B.PROTOTYPE FROM lo_log A,lo_log_type B WHERE A.LOG_SEQ = B.LOG_SEQ AND A.USER_SEQ = #user_seq# AND A.OPEN ='Y' ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN lo_log_data B ON A.USER_SEQ = B.USER_SEQ AND A.LOG_SEQ = B.LOG_SEQ AND A.LOG_ID = B.LOG_ID GROUP BY B.USER_SEQ, B.LOG_SEQ, B.LOG_ID

SELECT A.USER_SEQ, A.LOG_SEQ, A.LOG_ID, A.TITLE, A.INSERT_DATE, A.OPEN, A.SENSOR ,A.TYPE, A.EXECUTEFNC, A.PROTOTYPE, IFNULL(MAX(B.LOG_DATE),0) MAX_DATE, IFNULL(MIN(B.LOG_DATE),0) MIN_DATE FROM( SELECT A.USER_SEQ, A.LOG_SEQ, A.LOG_ID, A.TITLE, A.INSERT_DATE ,A.OPEN, A.SENSOR ,B.TYPE,B.EXECUTEFNC, B.PROTOTYPE FROM lo_log A,lo_log_type B WHERE A.LOG_SEQ = B.LOG_SEQ AND A.USER_SEQ = #user_seq# ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN lo_log_data B ON A.USER_SEQ = B.USER_SEQ AND A.LOG_SEQ = B.LOG_SEQ AND A.LOG_ID = B.LOG_ID GROUP BY B.USER_SEQ, B.LOG_SEQ, B.LOG_ID

SELECT A.USER_SEQ, A.LOG_SEQ, A.LOG_ID, A.TITLE, A.INSERT_DATE, A.OPEN, A.SENSOR ,A.TYPE, A.EXECUTEFNC, A.PROTOTYPE, MAX(B.LOG_DATE) MAX_DATE, MIN(B.LOG_DATE) MIN_DATE FROM( SELECT A.USER_SEQ, A.LOG_SEQ, A.LOG_ID, A.TITLE, A.INSERT_DATE ,A.OPEN, A.SENSOR ,B.TYPE,B.EXECUTEFNC, B.PROTOTYPE FROM lo_log A,lo_log_type B WHERE A.LOG_SEQ = B.LOG_SEQ AND A.USER_SEQ = #user_seq# AND A.LOG_SEQ=#log_seq# AND A.LOG_ID=#log_id# ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN lo_log_data B ON A.USER_SEQ = B.USER_SEQ AND A.LOG_SEQ = B.LOG_SEQ AND A.LOG_ID = B.LOG_ID GROUP BY B.USER_SEQ, B.LOG_SEQ, B.LOG_ID
SELECT 'YES' CNT FROM lo_log WHERE USER_SEQ = #user_seq# AND LOG_SEQ = #log_seq# AND LOG_ID = #log_id#
sqlmap.insert: INSERT INTO lo_log (USER_SEQ, LOG_SEQ, LOG_ID, TITLE, INSERT_DATE, OPEN, SENSOR) VALUES (#user_seq#, #log_seq#, #log_id#, #title#, #date#, #open#, #sensor#) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE TITLE = #title#, INSERT_DATE = #date# , OPEN = #open#, SENSOR = #sensor#
DELETE FROM lo_log WHERE USER_SEQ = #user_seq# AND LOG_SEQ = #log_seq# AND LOG_ID = #log_id#
sqlmap.select: SELECT A.NAME, A.USER_SEQ, A.LOG_SEQ, A.LOG_ID, A.TITLE, A.INSERT_DATE, A.OPEN, A.ICON, A.TYPE, A.EXECUTEFNC, A.PROTOTYPE, IFNULL(MAX(B.LOG_DATE),0) MAX_DATE, IFNULL(MIN(B.LOG_DATE),0) MIN_DATE FROM( SELECT C.NAME, A.USER_SEQ, A.LOG_SEQ, A.LOG_ID, A.TITLE, A.INSERT_DATE ,A.OPEN ,B.ICON,B.TYPE,B.EXECUTEFNC, B.PROTOTYPE FROM lo_log A,lo_log_type B ,lo_user_info C WHERE A.USER_SEQ = C.USER_SEQ AND A.LOG_SEQ = B.LOG_SEQ AND A.OPEN ='Y' AND A.TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#title#,'%') ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN lo_log_data B ON A.USER_SEQ = B.USER_SEQ AND A.LOG_SEQ = B.LOG_SEQ AND A.LOG_ID = B.LOG_ID GROUP BY B.USER_SEQ, B.LOG_SEQ, B.LOG_ID

SELECT B.LOG_DATE, B.LOG_DATA FROM lo_log A, lo_log_data B WHERE A.USER_SEQ = #user_seq# AND A.LOG_SEQ = #log_seq# AND A.LOG_ID = #log_id# AND A.OPEN='Y' AND A.USER_SEQ = B.USER_SEQ AND A.LOG_SEQ = B.LOG_SEQ AND A.LOG_ID = B.LOG_ID AND B.LOG_DATE BETWEEN #from_date# AND #to_date#
SELECT LOG_DATE, LOG_DATA FROM lo_log_data WHERE USER_SEQ = #user_seq# AND LOG_SEQ = #log_seq# and LOG_ID = #log_id# AND LOG_DATE BETWEEN #from_date# AND #to_date#
sqlmap.insert: INSERT INTO lo_log_data (USER_SEQ, LOG_SEQ, LOG_ID, LOG_DATE, LOG_DATA) VALUES (#user_seq#, #log_seq#, #log_id#, #log_date#, #log_data#)
DELETE FROM lo_log_data WHERE USER_SEQ = #user_seq# AND LOG_SEQ = #log_seq# AND LOG_ID = #log_id#
